org.cugos.wkg

Class WKBWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cugos.wkg.WKBWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Writer<byte[]>

    public class WKBWriter
extends Object
implements Writer<byte[]>
    A Well Known Binary Writer.
    Author:
    Jared Erickson
